name: @gapu/solid-query
description: A simple library for api integrations with solid.js

scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && auto-changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "docs: update Changelog"
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && auto-changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "docs: update Changelog"
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && auto-changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "docs: update Changelog"

author: Gabriel Pureliani
